cookie.subtitle: Please review our privacy policy, to fully understand how we handle your interactions with this website.
cookie.intro_text: Welcome to the Cookie Policy of Ta' To' Clean. This policy explains how our website uses cookies and similar technologies to ensure proper functionality, enhance user experience, and support our service processes, including booking management, customer interaction, and analytics. This Cookie Policy must be read together with our Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions.
cookie.important_purpose_text: This Cookie Policy explains: What cookies are. What types of cookies we use. Why we use them. How users can manage, disable, or delete cookies. Which third parties may set cookies through our website.
cookie.important_controller_text: Ta' To' Clean is responsible for the processing of data associated with cookies used on our website.
cookie.what_are_text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They allow us to recognize your browser, remember preferences, support technical processes such as appointment bookings, and improve performance. Cookies may be: Session cookies: deleted once the browser closes. Persistent cookies: remain on your device for a defined period. First-party: set by Ta' To' Clean. Third-party: set by external service providers.
cookie.types_necessary_text: These cookies are essential for the operation of the website and for enabling services such as: Completing appointment reservations. Temporarily storing booking information (name, email, phone, preferred date, and vehicle plate). Website security and fraud prevention. Technical functionality. These cookies cannot be disabled.
cookie.types_functional_text: Used to improve the user experience by remembering: Language settings. Basic page preferences. Optional form data retention.
cookie.types_analytical_text: Used to evaluate: How users interact with the booking process. Most visited sections of the website. Website performance, bounce rates, and errors. Third-party analytics may include: Google Analytics, Meta Pixel, Hosting provider monitoring tools. These require user consent.
cookie.types_marketing_text: Used to: Measure advertisement effectiveness. Conduct remarketing campaigns. Build anonymized interest profiles. These require explicit consent.
cookie.info_collected_text: Depending on the type of cookie, they may collect: IP address, Device characteristics, Browser type, Session identifiers, Booking process steps, User click interactions, Date and time of visits. Cookies do not store raw personal data (name, email, phone, or license plate), but may interact with systems where such data is submitted securely.
cookie.managing_text: Users can configure, accept, or reject cookies (except necessary cookies) through the cookie banner and through browser settings. Limiting cookies may affect booking functionality.
cookie.updates_text: Ta' To' Clean may update this policy at any time. The 'Last Updated' date will reflect changes.

privacy.subtitle: Please review our privacy policy, to fully understand how we handle your interactions with this website.
privacy.intro_text: Ta' To' Clean is committed to safeguarding your personal data. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you access our website, use our services, or interact with us. This policy complies with Colombian data protection law (Law 1581 of 2012, Decree 1377 of 2013).
privacy.collection_text: We collect information that you provide directly to us when: You create an account. You book a service. You contact us for support. Note: A user account is automatically created to manage your service history and bookings upon making your first reservation.
privacy.collection_personal_text: Full name, Email address, Phone number, Address (when required for mobile services).
privacy.collection_vehicle_text: Vehicle plate, Brand and model (optional), User-assigned nickname.
privacy.collection_technical_text: IP address, Browser type, Cookie data (see our Cookie Policy).
privacy.use_text: We use your information to: Process bookings and manage appointments. Communicate with you about your services. Improve our services and user experience. Send promotional updates (with your consent). Comply with legal obligations.
privacy.storage_text: Your data is stored on Supabase (secure database provider) with cloud-located servers. We retain your data while you maintain an active account or as necessary to provide services. You can request data deletion at any time.
privacy.sharing_text: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties, except: Service providers (e.g., Supabase for storage). When required by law. With your explicit consent.
privacy.cookies_text: See our Cookie Policy for detailed information on how we use cookies and similar technologies.
privacy.security_text: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or damage. However, no system is 100% secure.
privacy.minors_text: Our services are not directed to individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from minors.
privacy.updates_text: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through a notice on our website.
privacy.contact_text: For privacy questions or data requests, contact us at: Email: privacy@tatotoclean.com

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our services and platform.

booking.question: How do I make a reservation?
booking.answer:
Go to the booking page by clicking 'Book' or 'Schedule Appointment'.
Select your vehicle (existing or add a new one).
Choose the service you want.
Complete your contact details.
Select the available date and time.
Confirm your reservation.

booking.question: Do I need an account to book?
booking.answer: It is not mandatory. If you book without an account, one will be automatically created for you using your email and your vehicle plate as the password. We recommend changing the password after logging in.

booking.question: What types of services do you offer?
booking.answer:
Basic Wash: Basic exterior and interior cleaning.
Premium Wash: Deep detailing with carnauba wax.
Ceramic Coating: Long-lasting ceramic protection with 2-year warranty.
Interior Detailing: Complete interior restoration with steam and disinfection.
Paint Correction: Gloss restoration and defect removal.

booking.question: How far in advance should I book?
booking.answer: You can book in advance, but same-day booking is not available after 5:00 PM. We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance.

booking.question: What if there are no available slots?
booking.answer: If all slots for the day are taken, try selecting another date. Full days appear crossed out on the calendar.

booking.question: Can I cancel my reservation?
booking.answer: Yes. You can cancel your reservation from your dashboard up to 24 hours before the scheduled time for a full refund.

booking.question: How long does it take to confirm my reservation?
booking.answer: You will receive an immediate confirmation email after completing the booking process. The status will change from 'Pending' to 'Confirmed' when the team reviews your request.

booking.question: What vehicles do you accept?
booking.answer:
We accept:
Cars: Sedan, Hatchback, Coupe.
SUVs/Trucks: SUV, 4x4, Pick-up.
Motorcycles: All types of bikes.

booking.question: Do prices vary by vehicle type?
booking.answer: Yes. SUVs and trucks have a 1.2x price multiplier, while motorcycles have a 0.8x multiplier on the base price.

account.question: How do I create an account?
account.answer:
You can create an account in two ways:
Manually: Click 'Sign Up' and complete the form.
Automatically: When making a reservation without being authenticated, an account is automatically created.

account.question: I forgot my password, what do I do?
account.answer:
Go to the login page.
Click 'Forgot your password?'.
Enter your email.
You will receive a link to reset your password.

account.question: How do I change my password?
account.answer:
Log in to your account.
Go to 'Profile' from the sidebar.
In the 'Change Password' section, enter your new password.
Click 'Update Password'.

account.question: If I booked without an account, did I get credentials?
account.answer:
Yes. When you book without being authenticated, you receive via email:
User: Your email address.
Temporary password: Your vehicle plate (without hyphens).
We recommend changing this password after logging in for the first time.

account.question: Can I change my email?
account.answer: Yes, you can update your email from your profile. Note that this will affect your login.

account.question: Can I update my name or phone?
account.answer:
Yes, on the profile page you can update:
Full Name.
Phone Number.
Email Address.

account.question: What if I am redirected to the dashboard when trying to go to login?
account.answer: If you are already logged in, you will be automatically redirected to your dashboard when trying to access authentication pages (login, signup, forgot-password).

vehicles.question: How do I add a vehicle?
vehicles.answer:
From your dashboard:
Click the 'Add Vehicle' button (+ icon).
Select the vehicle type.
Enter the plate (mandatory).
Optionally add brand, model, and nickname.
Click 'Add Vehicle'.

vehicles.question: Can I edit my vehicle information?
vehicles.answer: Yes. Click on the vehicle card in your dashboard to open details, then click the 'Edit' button to modify the information.

vehicles.question: Can I delete a vehicle?
vehicles.answer: Yes, but note that this will unlink all reservations associated with that vehicle. These reservations will not be deleted but will no longer appear in your history.

vehicles.question: What format should the plate have?
vehicles.answer:
Depending on the vehicle type:
Car/SUV: Format ABC123 or ABC-123.
Motorcycle: Format ABC12D or ABC-12D.

vehicles.question: It says the plate is already registered, what do I do?
vehicles.answer:
This means that:
If you have an account: You already have that vehicle in your list.
Without account: Another user already has that vehicle registered.
If you think this is an error, contact support.

vehicles.question: Can I have multiple vehicles registered?
vehicles.answer: Yes, there is no limit. You can add as many vehicles as you wish.

vehicles.question: What is the 'Primary' vehicle?
vehicles.answer: The vehicle marked as 'Primary' ('P' badge) is your default vehicle and will appear first in the list.

vehicles.question: Can I see the service history of each vehicle?
vehicles.answer:
Yes. Clicking on a vehicle opens a modal with:
Vehicle details.
Last service performed.
Suggested next maintenance.
Full service history for that vehicle.

payments.question: When is payment made?
payments.answer: Payment is processed at the time of service, not when booking. We accept multiple payment methods on site.

payments.question: How are prices calculated?
payments.answer:
The final price is:
Service Price Ã— Vehicle Type Multiplier.
Examples:
Premium Wash ($120,000) for car = $120,000.
Premium Wash ($120,000) for SUV = $144,000 (Ã—1.2).
Premium Wash ($120,000) for motorcycle = $96,000 (Ã—0.8).

payments.question: Do prices include taxes?
payments.answer: Yes, all displayed prices include applicable taxes.

payments.question: Are there discounts for multiple services?
payments.answer: Currently there are no automatic discounts, but you can contact the team for personalized packages.

payments.question: Can I see my total spend?
payments.answer: Yes, in your dashboard there is a card showing your 'Total Spend' summing all completed services.

dashboard.question: What can I do in my dashboard?
dashboard.answer:
View statistics (total vehicles, active bookings, next appointment).
Manage your vehicles (add, edit, delete).
View service history.
Filter bookings by status and vehicle.
Cancel active bookings.
Access your profile.
View your reviews.

dashboard.question: What do the different booking statuses mean?
dashboard.answer:
Pending: Booking created, awaiting confirmation.
Confirmed: Booking confirmed by the team.
In Progress: Service is being performed.
Completed: Service finished.
Cancelled: Booking cancelled.

dashboard.question: Why does my booking appear as 'Completed' automatically?
dashboard.answer: The system automatically updates pending or confirmed bookings to 'Completed' when the booking date and time has passed.

dashboard.question: Can I filter my bookings?
dashboard.answer:
Yes, you can filter by:
Status: All, Active, Completed.
Vehicle: All or a specific vehicle.

dashboard.question: How do I see the full history?
dashboard.answer: By default, the last 5 bookings are shown. Click 'View full history' to expand the complete list.

dashboard.question: Can I book directly from a vehicle?
dashboard.answer: Yes. In the vehicle details modal, click 'Book new service' to go directly to the booking page with that vehicle pre-selected.

reviews.question: How to rate a service?
reviews.answer:
After your booking is completed:
Go to your dashboard.
Click 'Rate' on the completed booking.
Select stars (1-5).
Write a comment (optional).
Decide if you want it to be public.
Click 'Submit Rating'.

reviews.question: Can I make my review public?
reviews.answer: Yes. When rating a service, there is a toggle that says 'Allow my review to be public on the home page'. If you activate it, your review will appear in the testimonials section.

reviews.question: Can I edit or delete my review?
reviews.answer: Currently you can only delete reviews from the 'My Reviews' page in the dashboard. There is no edit option, you would have to delete it and create a new one.

reviews.question: Where do I see all my reviews?
reviews.answer: In the dashboard sidebar, click 'My Reviews' to see all the ratings you have made.

reviews.question: Can I rate the same service again?
reviews.answer: No, each booking can only be rated once.

reviews.question: What happens to my reviews if I delete a vehicle?
reviews.answer: Reviews are maintained, as they are linked to the booking, not the vehicle itself.

technical.question: I didn't receive the confirmation email
technical.answer:
Check:
Spam folder: Check your junk mail.
Correct email: Make sure you entered the email correctly.
Email server: Sometimes there can be delays of up to 5 minutes.
If you don't receive it, contact support.

technical.question: The calendar shows no available days
technical.answer:
This can happen if:
All slots for the month are taken.
There is an error loading availability.
Your internet connection is failing.
Try reloading the page or selecting another month.

technical.question: I can't select a time on the calendar
technical.answer:
Check that:
You have selected a date first.
The time is not already booked (appears disabled).
It is not a past time.

technical.question: Dark theme is not saved
technical.answer: The theme is saved in your browser's local storage. If you use incognito mode or clear cookies regularly, it will not be saved.

technical.question: Page doesn't load correctly on mobile
technical.answer:
The site is fully responsive. If you have problems:
Refresh the page.
Clear browser cache.
Try another browser.

technical.question: I don't see my vehicles on the booking page
technical.answer:
Make sure to:
Be authenticated.
Have added at least one vehicle from the dashboard.
Reload the page.

technical.question: The 'Next' button doesn't work on the booking form
technical.answer:
This means there are mandatory fields incomplete or with validation errors. Check:
Correct plate format.
Valid email.
All required fields completed.

privacy.question: What personal data do you collect?
privacy.answer:
We collect:
Personal information: Name, email, phone.
Vehicle information: Plate, brand, model.
Technical information: IP address, browser type.
See the full Privacy Policy for more details.

privacy.question: How do you protect my data?
privacy.answer:
Secure storage in Supabase with encryption.
Row-Level Security (RLS) policies in the database.
Secure authentication.
We do not share data with third parties without consent.

privacy.question: Can I request deletion of my data?
privacy.answer: Yes. You can request the deletion of your account and all associated data by contacting support at privacy@tatotoclean.com.

privacy.question: Do you use cookies?
privacy.answer:
Yes. We use cookies for:
Essential site operation.
Remembering preferences (language, theme).
Performance analysis.
See the full Cookie Policy.

privacy.question: Can I manage cookies?
privacy.answer: Yes, you can accept or reject non-essential cookies from the cookie banner. Strictly necessary cookies cannot be disabled.

privacy.question: Is my data visible to other users?
privacy.answer: No. Your personal data is only visible to you and site administrators.

privacy.question: Do you sell my information to third parties?
privacy.answer: No. We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties, except necessary service providers (like Supabase for storage) or when required by law.

admin.question: How do I access the admin panel?
admin.answer: Only users with administrator permissions can access. If you are not admin and try to access /admin, you will be automatically redirected.

admin.question: What can I do as an administrator?
admin.answer:
View all bookings from all users.
Change booking status.
View global statistics (revenue, total bookings).
Manage reviews (hide/show, delete).
Filter and search bookings.
Sort by price, date, or status.

admin.question: How to change the status of a booking?
admin.answer: Click the status dropdown in the 'Actions' column and select the new status. The change is saved immediately.

admin.question: Can I see the confirmation email the client received?
admin.answer: Not directly from the panel, but you can verify it was sent by checking Edge Functions logs in Supabase.

admin.question: How do I hide or show reviews?
admin.answer:
In the 'Reviews' tab of the admin:
Find the review.
Click the eye button (hide) or eye with line (show).
The change applies immediately.

admin.question: How do I delete a review?
admin.answer:
In the 'Reviews' tab:
Click the delete button (trash icon).
Confirm the action.
The review will be permanently deleted.

admin.question: Are statistics updated in real-time?
admin.answer: Yes. The admin panel uses Supabase Realtime, so statistics and bookings update automatically when there are changes.

language.question: What languages is the site available in?
language.answer:
The site is available in:
Spanish (default).
English.

language.question: How do I change the language?
language.answer: Click the language selector in the header (ES/EN). The change applies immediately.

language.question: Is my language preference saved?
language.answer: Yes, it is saved in the browser's local storage. Also, the URL changes to reflect the language (e.g., /en/home for English).

language.question: Are all pages translated?
language.answer: Yes, all pages, forms, error messages, and notifications are fully translated into Spanish and English.

language.question: Can I switch between light and dark theme?
language.answer: Yes. From the dashboard, click the theme toggle button in the sidebar to switch between light and dark mode.

language.question: Does the theme sync between devices?
language.answer: No, the theme is saved locally in each browser. If you use another device or browser, you will have to configure it again.

language.question: How do I navigate between sections of the main page?
language.answer: Use the navigation menu in the header. Clicking a section will smooth scroll to that section.

language.question: What is 'smooth scroll'?
language.answer: It is the smooth scrolling applied when navigating between sections of the page, providing a more fluid experience.

support.question: How do I contact support?
support.answer:
You can contact us via:
General email: info@tatotoclean.com
Privacy email: privacy@tatotoclean.com
Contact section: On the main page, go to the 'Contact' section.

support.question: Is there a schedule?
support.answer: Available booking hours are 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM. For support inquiries, we will respond during business hours.

support.question: Is there WhatsApp for contact?
support.answer: This is not specified in the current system, but you can check in the contact section or site footer.

others.question: What browsers are compatible?
others.answer:
The site works in all modern browsers:
Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, Opera.

others.question: Is the site responsive?
others.answer: Yes, the site is fully optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop.

others.question: Can I access from my phone?
others.answer: Absolutely. The design is mobile-first and works perfectly on mobile devices.

others.question: Is there a mobile app?
others.answer: Currently no, but the website is optimized for mobile and provides an app-like experience.

others.question: How do I report a bug?
others.answer:
If you find a problem:
Take a screenshot if possible.
Note what you were doing when it happened.
Send this information to info@tatotoclean.com.

others.question: Is there a loyalty program or memberships?
others.answer: The site mentions 'Memberships' in the menu, but currently only shows service plans (Basic, Premium, Elite).

others.question: Do you offer mobile service?
others.answer: This is not clearly specified in the system. Contact the team to confirm if mobile service is available.

others.question: How long does each service take?
others.answer: The estimated time for each service is not specified in the current system. It is recommended to ask when booking.

others.question: What if I arrive late to my appointment?
others.answer: The lateness policy is not specified. It is recommended to contact in advance if you know you will be late.

others.question: Can I change the date/time of my reservation?
others.answer: Currently there is no 'edit booking' function. You would have to cancel and create a new reservation.

specific_technical.question: What if I see the error 'Row-Level Security policy violation'?
specific_technical.answer:
This is an internal database permission error. It is usually resolved by:
Logging out and logging back in.
Clearing cache.
If it persists, contact support.

specific_technical.question: Why does it say 'This plate is already registered'?
specific_technical.answer:
It means a vehicle with that plate already exists:
In your vehicle list (if authenticated).
Or registered by another user.

specific_technical.question: Can I use the same plate for multiple accounts?
specific_technical.answer: No. Each plate can only be registered once in the system globally.

specific_technical.question: What is 'automatic account creation'?
specific_technical.answer:
When you make a reservation without being registered, the system automatically creates an account using:
Your email as username.
The vehicle plate as temporary password.
You receive these credentials by email so you can access your dashboard later.

specific_technical.question: How does data synchronization work?
specific_technical.answer:
The system uses:
Supabase Realtime for live updates.
React Query for optimized data caching.
Edge Functions for email sending.

specific_technical.question: What happens to my bookings if I delete my vehicle?
specific_technical.answer: Bookings are not deleted, but are 'unlinked' from your account. The system updates the email associated with those bookings to an anonymous state.

tips.question: Recommendations for new users
tips.answer:
Create an account before making your first reservation.
Add all your vehicles to the dashboard.
Check the availability calendar well.
Save your credentials in a safe place.
Change the temporary password as soon as possible.

tips.question: For a better booking experience
tips.answer:
Book at least 24 hours in advance.
Complete all optional fields (brand, model) for better service.
Enable email notifications.
Check your confirmation email.
Rate the service after completion.

tips.question: Vehicle management
tips.answer:
Use descriptive nicknames for your vehicles.
Keep brand and model information updated.
Mark your primary vehicle for quick access.
Check history regularly.

tips.question: Account security
tips.answer:
Use a secure password (at least 6 characters).
Do not share your credentials.
Log out on shared devices.
Always verify the site URL.
